item.name: Authentication

exec: // Storing the access token in the environment to be used in other endpoints

request.description:
This request creates a new user.

**Note:** If you want to add yourself as an admin, you can add a key named "role" and set the value "admin" as a part of the request body.

This request also has a test script that sets the authorization token received in the response in the `accessToken` collection variable. This helps you reuse the token in other requests easily.

item.name: Image processing

request.description: Lets you resize an image i.e. change the dimensions (width and height) of an image while maintaining its aspect ratio.

originalRequest.description: Lets you resize an image i.e. change the dimensions (width and height) of an image while maintaining its aspect ratio.

request.description: Lets you crop an image i.e. select and extract a specific rectangular region or portion of an image while discarding the rest.

originalRequest.description: Lets you crop an image i.e. select and extract a specific rectangular region or portion of an image while discarding the rest.

request.description:
Lets you apply a filter to an image i.e. the process of applying various visual effects or modifications to alter its appearance.

For example, applying a grayscale filter to an image will convert it into a grayscale or black-and-white version where each pixel's color is represented by shades of gray.

originalRequest.description:
Lets you apply a filter to an image i.e. the process of applying various visual effects or modifications to alter its appearance.

For example, applying a grayscale filter to an image will convert it into a grayscale or black-and-white version where each pixel's color is represented by shades of gray.

request.description: Lets you rotate an image i.e. change the orientation of an image by a certain angle.

originalRequest.description: Lets you rotate an image i.e. change the orientation of an image by a certain angle.

request.description: Lets you convert the image format e.g.: from jpg to png.

originalRequest.description: Lets you convert the image format e.g.: from jpg to png.

request.description:
Lets you compress the image i.e. reduce its file size while maintaining an acceptable level of image quality.

The compression level refers to the extent or intensity of the compression applied to an image. It determines how much the image's file size will be reduced and can impact the resulting image quality.

originalRequest.description:
Lets you compress the image i.e. reduce its file size while maintaining an acceptable level of image quality.

The compression level refers to the extent or intensity of the compression applied to an image. It determines how much the image's file size will be reduced and can impact the resulting image quality.

request.description: Lets you add a watermark to the image i.e. a visible overlay, typically a logo, text, or an identifying mark, onto an image to indicate ownership, protect copyright, or add branding.

originalRequest.description: Lets you add a watermark to the image i.e. a visible overlay, typically a logo, text, or an identifying mark, onto an image to indicate ownership, protect copyright, or add branding.

item.description: This folder includes requests for various image processing operations, such as resizing, cropping, rotating, filtering, or manipulating images.

item.name: Image analysis

request.description:
Identifies and locates objects within an image.

The goal of object detection is to determine the presence, position, and extent of specific objects of interest within the given input data.

originalRequest.description:
Identifies and locates objects within an image.

The goal of object detection is to determine the presence, position, and extent of specific objects of interest within the given input data.

request.description: Lets you analyze and identify human faces within images or videos.

originalRequest.description: Lets you analyze and identify human faces within images or videos.

request.description: Lets you analyze an image and classify it into various predefined scene categories or classes.

originalRequest.description: Lets you analyze an image and classify it into various predefined scene categories or classes.
